fulltext:
NGUYEN THI MINH UYEN 
68 Chuong Duong, Thu Duc Dist., HCMC                                                                    
Cell: +84 909 07 8286 
Email:  uyenmnguyen1980@gmail.com  
OBJECTIVES & PERSONAL PROFILES 
Developing business strategy to optimize sales, achieve highest profit and identify and proactive 
expand new business opportunities in long term. 
 10 years at Key Account Management  
 Communication & presentation skills  
 10 years at Healthcare industry  
 Sense of Business Development 
 4 years at Data Science 
 Team work, self-confident, pro-active 
EDUCATION 
1998 – 2002 
University of Natural Sciences – B.S at Chemical 
Chemistry department – Major at Analytical Chemistry 
2005 - 2007 
San Diego State University – California – US 
Certificate of Completion in Pre – MBA advanced program  
Bellevue Community College – Washington – US (Overall GPA 3.92/4.0) 
Associate of Art in Business Administration 
Certificate of Accomplishment in Sales and Marketing  
TRAINING COURSES ATTENDED 
 Competition law training session, conducted by DSM APAC lawyers in Singapore (March 19, 
2009). 
 Sales excellence training program – Advanced Negotiation: conducted by Gustav Kaser 
International in Philippines (May 11-13, 2009). 
 Account Manager training course in Singapore: Customer Intimacy – Distributor Strategy (Jan 13-
15, 2010). 
 Account Manager training course in Singapore: Leadership (Jan 16-17, 2012). 
 Account Manager training course in Singapore: Advanced Selling Skills (Mar 3-7, 2013). 
 Managing@ IMS Health course (Aug 4-6 , 2015)  
 E-learning courses at IMS: Code of Conduct, Anti Bribery, Sales training program, etc. 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
4/2018 – 04/19 
3/2014 – 4/2018 
Title: STRATEGIC PARTNERSHIP ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR 
HORUS LTD. CO.  (a start-up company) 
 Business nature: Integrated services to academia, biopharma, medical device, 
and healthcare industry 
RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 
Responsible for achieving sales targets and related performance metrics. 
 
Develop sales and marketing plan to identify new business opportunities with 
existing clients to expand the project base and strengthen the business 
relationships. 
 
Target key pharmaceutical companies, CROs, institutions, & universities to 
establish and develop long term partnership with KOLs. 
 
Conduct direct selling activities, including prospecting, following-up calls, 
meetings and sponsor presentations. 
 
Identify opportunities for Horus to provide innovative solutions to sponsor ‘s 
need. 
 
Maintain and update customer contact database, and generate sales pipeline, 
forecasts and activity reports. 
Title: ACCOUNT MANAGER 
IQVIA (formerly known as IMS Health) 
 Business nature: Expert in Human Data Science 
RESPONSIBILITIES: 
 Expand and generate new business, understand clients needs, expectation and 
captured business opportunities. 
 Develop new business to potential clients, IMS presented and designed 
suitable offerings.  
 Managing & collaborating with key accounts, act as the contact point 
between company and clients.  
11/2007 – 7/2013 
 Responsible for achievement of sales target and consistently reviews sales 
and client coverage to deliver maximum efficiency/impact. 
 Consultant on IMS services: Information Analytics and Commercial 
Effectiveness Services: Vietnam national market audit, Commercial model, 
Primary market research, Sales forces effectiveness, Segmentation & 
Targeting, Learning solution & change management. 
 Meeting with Clients to understand Clients strategy focus and consulting 
based on critical market data and effectiveness services. 
 Solving & feedback to Clients and Operation teams any issues happened. 
Build strategic partnership with clients in long-term. 
 Coordinate with Operation/ Client service / Commercial Effectiveness 
Departments and Regional/Global Team to deploy the project, commitment 
with clients. 
 Sales forecast and accounts planning, P&L management and initiatives new 
business opportunities in Vietnam 
 Business development, coordination with Medical team, R&D team of Local 
clients to explore the opportunities of Clinical Trial under expert of Quintiles 
– the first official CRO of MNC in Vietnam. 
 Key clients managing such as: Sanofi, Pfizer, Novartis, MSD, GSK, Merck, 
Bayer, Janssen, Abbott, Mega, Zuellig, Duoc Hau Giang, Traphaco,…     
Title: PHARMA INDUSTRY MANAGER 
DSM NUTRITIONAL PRODUCTS VN (formerly known as ROCHE Vitamins & 
Fine Chemical, 100% invested by Dutch) 
 Business nature: Manufacturing & Trading of Vitamins and Fine Chemical 
Ingredients. 
RESPONSIBILITES: 
Implementation of the sales strategies:  
 Plan and implement the sales and margins according to agreed target, mainly 
work at Food and Pharma divisions contributed to sales performance of 
Vietnam. Some short period working in Personal care division 
 Propose local price structure within country and regional guidelines.  
Sales development 
Make regular sales calls/ visits to develop professional relationships and follow 
up on needs aiming to close deals and finalize contracts 
 Select, manage and develop some potential accounts  
 Initiate new projects on customer needs by technical advice, marketing 
proposals, concepts creation, product modifications, market trends update, 
etc. 
 Report regularly about commercial aspects: total market development, 
market shares, price development, competition, consumer trends, regulatory 
affairs, etc.  
Customers/ Distributors management: 
 Establish action plans to keep long term and strong relationship with strategic 
8/2005 – 8/2007 
10/2002 – 5/2005 
accounts and distributors 
 Complain management, follow up from receiving orders to arriving 
shipments to support customers and solve all related problems 
 Conduct market research via visits, calls, interviews to understand customer’s 
expectation and needs 
 Regular interactions with KAMs, AMs, and other departments in region: 
commercial, finance, logistics, quality, RA, RD to serve customers quickly 
 Organize workshops, customer events, and overseas customer. 
STUDY IN USA 
 Worked part – time in a French dry-cleaning store and a spa store. 
 Attended meetings of business, customer services, sales, and marketing 
presented by professors and visitors in BCC. 
 Completed many team research and projects about companies: Coca Cola, 
Lancôme, Adidas, P&G using learnt method of business, marketing, 
statistics, and selling. 
 Member of National Dean’s List, Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society 
 BCC scholarships for international students 
Title: QA TECHNICIAN 
UNILEVER VIETNAM (100% invested by Anglo-Dutch) 
 Business nature: Manufacturing many branded home and personal care 
categories. 
RESPONSIBILITES: 
 Finally controlled and assured the quality of finished products (personal care 
category).  
 Audited and assured the quality of internal imported products within regional 
Unilever. 
 Worked directly with Unilever staff in region about quality of products. 
 Analyzed and assured quality of raw materials before used into production. 
 Periodically audited and appraised company and competitors’ products tested 
quality and reported the audit to QA manager and board of management. 
 Co-ordinated with R&D department in research and appraise material for 
new projects. 
 Some training courses attended: 
 Training courses of ISO 9001:2000, ISO 14001, OHSAS 18001, and 
HACCP. 
 Training courses of working skills in lab. 
 Team working skill, problem solving skill, etc 
SKILLS 
Language: Fluent in English; Intermediate in German (B degree). 
Computer: MS Office; Familiar with SAP system APO forecast. 
Sales and marketing skills - Leaderships and management. 
Public speaking and presentation skills. 
Market Access and Business Planning Strategy. 
HOBBIES 
Religious activities; Travel; Music; Gym. 
ACHIEVEMENTS 
Member of National Dean’s List, Phi Theta Kappa Honor Society, BCC college 
Annual target sales increment at avg. 15 – 18 % 
Growth rate for key account at 45% 
Pro-active and develop new accounts
